'''''A Delusion's Abilities Don't Decide a Battle's Outcome''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[Childe]] in Co-op Mode.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's title references a quote from {{w|Mobile Suit Gundam}}, "fighting strength isn't determined by differences in mobile suit performance".<ref>The original quote is {{ja|モビルスーツの性能の違いが、戦力の決定的差ではない|Mobiru Suutsu no seinou no chigai ga, senryoku no ketteitekisa de wa nai}}, which is how the Japanese title of the achievement is phrased.</ref>
